verses.t: And in that day{H3117} thou shalt say{H559}, LordO {H3068}, I will praise{H3034} thee: though thou wast angry{H599} with me, thine anger{H639} is turned away{H7725}, and thou comfortedst{H5162} me.
Behold, God{H410} is my salvation{H3444}; I will trust{H982}, and not be afraid{H6342}: Lordfor the {H3050} Jehovah is my strength{H5797} and my song{H2176}; he also is become my salvation{H3444}.
Therefore with joy{H8342} shall ye draw{H7579} water{H4325} out of the wells{H4599} of salvation{H3444}.

And in that day{H3117} shall ye say{H559}, Praise{H3034} Lordthe {H3068}, call{H7121} upon his name{H8034}, declare{H3045} his doings{H5949} among the people{H5971}, make mention{H2142} that his name{H8034} is exalted{H7682}.callâ€¦: or, proclaim
Sing{H2167} Lordunto the {H3068}; for he hath done{H6213} excellent things{H1348}: this is known{H3045} in all the earth{H776}.
Cry out{H6670} and shout{H7442}, thou inhabitant{H3427} of Zion{H6726}: for great{H1419} is the Holy One{H6918} of Israel{H3478} in the midst{H7130} of thee.inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress
